actions.description: The pledgemage makes two Exponential Lash attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: {@atk ms,rs} 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) force damage, and the pledgemage can cause one creature it can see within 30 feet of the target to take 10 (2d6 + 3) force damage.
actions.name: Exponential Lash

actions.description:
The pledgemage casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):
At will: guidance, mage hand

1/day each: dimension door, enlarge/reduce, mage armor, plant growth
actions.name: Spellcasting
